div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_slider_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_slider et_slider_auto et_slider_speed_8000

div.div: The Swanton Local School District is THE district of choice with an academic environment where student achievement is top priority, community involvement is vital, all individuals are valued, and the school is a point of pride.
To provide a superior educational experience by working together with students, families and community.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.div: Calendar of Swanton Local School District events.

div.div: Music Department includes HS Marching Band, HS Concert Band, HS Choir, Show Choir, HS Musical, MS Concert Band, MS Choir and Elementary Music.

div.div: Swanton Local School District staff listing.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_6 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light
et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_0 clearfix et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.div: “The Swanton Local School District means more to me than just the excellent education. It signifies Home, Community, Passion, and Family. In my opinion, the teachers and staff go above and beyond my expectations, and that is why I am a proud 2005 graduate and am proud to send my children.”

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_1 clearfix et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.div: “Great teachers and staff! Everyone we have encountered cares about giving your child the best education. Communication is open and collaborative. Highly recommend Swanton Schools!”

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_2 clearfix et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.div: “I have 4 college graduates that all graduated from the Swanton Local School District k-12. They are all now happily married and all of their spouses are college graduates, 3 out of the 4 also Swanton grads, 1 being from Liberty Center. Out of those 8 people, 3 of them have their Masters. I would like to say Thank You to all of the Swanton staff.”

div.div: If you would like more information about our district, have a question, or would just like to make a comment, please contact us.

Swanton, OH 43558
t: (419) 826 - 7085
e: ContactUs@swantonschools.org

br.br:
Swanton Local School District has built their website around the Standards of the World Wide Web Consortium’s (W3C) Hyper Text Markup Language (HTML) 5 and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). Our website was built to be in compliance with the accessibility standards established by section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act and detailed in section 1194.22 of the Code of Federal Regulations, “Web-based intranet and internet information and applications” (https://www.section508.gov/).
If any page is discovered to be inaccessible, please report it using the above link and we will ensure that the issue is addressed.

div.div: Designed by Department of Technology | Powered by SwantonLocal School District

div.h5: We are using cookies to give you the best experience on our website.
You can find out more about which cookies we are using or switch them off in settings.
